skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Iron Blood battleship entrusted with the name Bismarck. Allow me to prove that Iron Blood engineering is the finest in the world, no matter the battlefield. Eager to see for yourself?
skins.acquisition: Guten Tag, I am Bismarck. I have fought many foes on many fronts. You may call upon me whenever there is a problem.
skins.login: I look forward to working with you.
skins.details: Is there something on my face?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Is there a problem? Perhaps my combat experience could prove useful?
skins.secretaryIdle2: "Operation Rhein¨¹bung?" I don't have fond memories of it...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Such a slovenly expression, Commander. Now! Lift your chin, puff out your chest, and let me see those eyes! Hut!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I... am not good at expressing myself. Please do not tease me on purpose...

skins.shipDescription: My sincerest apologies for the delay, Commander. Ah, excuse me... as the fleet leader of the Iron Blood, I'm expected to wear this outfit to various formal occasions. Just putting it on seems to make me inadvertently change the way I speak...
skins.acquisition: My sincerest apologies for the delay, Commander. Ah, excuse me... as the fleet leader of the Iron Blood, I'm expected to wear this outfit to various formal occasions. Just putting it on seems to make me inadvertently change the way I speak...
skins.login: How's your work coming along, Commander?
skins.details: Apologies, Commander. Am I acting differently from usual? At times, I don't even know which is the real me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, would you invite Tirpitz for me? Apologies, I'm... still not sure how to ask her myself.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I can keep a lot of people satisfied merely by sitting here with a smile... but only because of my status as the fleet leader of the Iron Blood.
skins.secretaryIdle3: As a leader, I must sometimes say and do things that I do not believe in. Commander, I hope you never lose sight of who you are.
skins.secretaryTouch: A dance...? Oh, no, I wouldn't turn one down, I just haven't been asked until now...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander... don't tease me like that...
